statements: DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50;
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id IN (SELECT post_id FROM posts WHERE date < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM posts WHERE likes < 100 AND shares > 50
DELETE FROM users WHERE followers > 1000 AND followings < 500
DELETE FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes > 100 AND shares < 50;
DELETE FROM AudienceEngagement WHERE likes < 10 OR shares < 5;
DELETE FROM ContentStrategyMetrics WHERE metric_value < 0.5 AND date_recorded < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM posts WHERE user_id = 2 AND created_at < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM comments WHERE user_id = 3 OR post_id = 4
DELETE FROM engagements WHERE user_id = 101 AND post_id = 201
